 2019-11792019-08-07,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Corrections and Conditional Release Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CORRECTIONS AND CONDITIONAL RELEASE REGULATIONS in order to (1) support and operationalize the legislative changes introduced through Bill C-83, which strengthens the federal correctional system's ability to provide a safe and humane environment for inmates; and (2) support the rehabilitation of offenders and their reintegration into the community and to reduce the risk of re-offending, keeping our communities safe.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0299 Publication Date: 2019-08-21
AttachmentsAttachment
